bilingual.source: Payment due hereunder payment due under this agreement
The book report is due in two weeks.
He was absent from the class today due to illness.
bilingual.target: 由于生病，他缺席了今天的课程。

bilingual.source: Experts say this bad weather has occurred due to climate change.
bilingual.target: 专家说这种恶劣天气是由于气候变化引起的。

bilingual.source: The baby is due in two weeks.
bilingual.target: 宝宝预定的出生时间是两周后。
报告预定的提交时间是下周一。

yingyinNormal.en: I believe today is Bernadette's due date.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道今天是伯纳黛特的预产日。

yingyinNormal.en: With all due respect, sir, it could've been worse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恕我直言，长官，事情本来更糟。

yingyinNormal.en: Joey, that's just the minimum amount due, that's your total due.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊，那只是最低应缴金额，总金额在这里。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you remember that rent is due next week? Probably not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还记得下星期就要付房租吗? 大概不记得了吧?

yingyinNormal.en: They were due in town for the cattle drive over two days ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们本该参加镇上的赶牛活动，晚了不止两天。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I would assume it's because Sheldon and I stay in touch due to mutual interest and respect, while you avoid me, due to unresolved childhood issues.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为是由于我和谢尔顿因共同的兴趣和对彼此的尊重而时常联系，而你却因你那无法释怀的童年阴影，总是躲着我。

yingyinNormal.en: My due date is in one week. What are you doing up? That is seven days.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的预产期是一星期后。你为什么不睡觉？只剩七天。

yingyinNormal.en: You broke into my office. With due respect, sir, you broke into my mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你闯入了我的办公室。恕我直言，先生，你闯入了我的大脑。

yingyinNormal.en: With all due respect, Guardian, your powers have proved unreliable at best recently.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恕我直言，守护者，你的力量已经证明不可靠，尤其是最近。

yingyinNormal.en: Nothing. I just due diligence. If Chumhum doesn't come with us, we don't have a firm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没事，我只是出于谨慎问一问，如果查查网不跟我们走，我们就开不了事务所。

yingyinNormal.en: The left engine was lost in the crash due to excessive damage on touchdown. But we can circle back to that later. Let's just assume that it was, as you say, a dual engine loss due to bird strike.
yingyinNormal.zh: 左翼发动机在坠机过程中，因水面撞击而丢失，不过我们可以以后再研究这个问题，我们就先假定你说的是事实因鸟击造成双发停车。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, her molecular epidemiology paper is due tomorrow. Oh, tell her good luck with that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，她明天要交分子流行病学报告。帮我祝她好运。

yingyinNormal.en: With due respect, sir, I'm not sure you've told me the entire truth about this situation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恕我直言，先生，我觉得你没把真相完全告诉我。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, she's due tomorrow. Although it did take her six years to finish high school, so who knows?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她预计明天生，不过她当年高中念了六年，鬼知道这次又要多久？

yingyinNormal.en: Because that's what ending with the entitlement you believe you're due. So, you sit. And you think.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为这就是你坚信自己拥有的权利给你带来的下场。所以给我坐下，然后想清楚了。

yingyinNormal.en: You stated that it was a dual engine failure due to multiple bird strikes? That would be unprecedented.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说因遭飞鸟多次撞击造成双发停车？这是前所未有的情况。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, you can't be doing this right now. You got finals. Your NYU application is due in what, two weeks?
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，你现在不可以这么做。你有期末考，纽约大学的申请，过两星期就到期了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: So we need to close the E.R.? We're dangerously low on meds. Personnel can't make it in due to the flooding.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以需要关闭急诊吗？药物严重不足，因为洪水，其他医生没法赶来。

yingyinNormal.en: That's what everybody says but with all due respect, Miss, I'm not the one hanging off the back of a ship here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家都这么说，但是说了你别生气，现在挂在船尾想做傻事的人可不是我。

yingyinNormal.en: Folks, it's long past due to increase the minimum wage that will lift millions of hardworking families out of poverty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 朋友们，提高最低工资标准已经提了很长时间了，走出这一步将让数百万工薪家庭摆脱贫困。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 由...导致的；应归功于；应归咎于

examination_example.sentence: When we shy away from casual interactions with strangers, it is often <highlight>due</highlight> to a misplaced anxiety that they might not want to talk to us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们回避与陌生人的随意互动时，往往是出于一种错位的焦虑，担心他们可能不想与我们交谈。

examination_example.sentence: Ferraro suggests the results may transfer to other parts of Asia, <highlight>due</highlight> to commonalities such as the importance of growing rice and market access.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 费拉罗表示，由于种植水稻的重要性和市场准入等共性，这一结果可能会转移到亚洲其他地区。

examination_example.sentence: It takes about three weeks to a month to notice significant changes in your weight <highlight>due</highlight> to altering your training program.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约需要三周到一个月的时间才能注意到你的体重因改变训练计划而发生的显著变化。

sense_info_list.en:
of the proper quality or extent; 
a thing that should be given to someone by right

examination_example.sentence: It failed to pay <highlight>due</highlight> attention to patients' rights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它（NHS和DeepMind之间的协议）没有对病人的权利给予应有的重视。
阻止律师获得应得的利润

sense_info_list.en: expected at or planned for at a certain time

examination_example.sentence: It said that Internet Explorer 10, the version <highlight>due</highlight> to appear with Windows 8, would have DNT as a default.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它（微软）说，预期与Windows 8 一起发布的Internet Explorer 10 版本将把DNT（禁止追踪）作为一个默认值。

examination_example.sentence: Microsoft's Internet Explorer and Apple's Safari both offer DNT; Google's Chrome is <highlight>due</highlight> to do so this year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 微软的Internet Explorer浏览器和苹果的Safari浏览器都提供DNT（禁止追踪）选项；谷歌的Chrome浏览器预期于今年推出。

sense_info_list.en:
(of a payment) required at a certain time;
charges, for example to be a member of a club

word_usage.usage:
due表示“应得的”时，多在句中作表语，不可作前置定语，例：
She was due for a rise.
她该加薪了。

due作“应付的”解时，后常跟to sb.，表示“应支付某人”，例：
The wages due to him will be paid tomorrow.
欠他的工资明天付给他。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en:
of the proper quality or extent; 
a thing that should be given to someone by right

examination_example.sentence: Failure to pay <highlight>due</highlight> attention to their behavior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 未能对自己的行为给予应有的关注。

sense_info_list.en:
(of a payment) required at a certain time;
charges, for example to be a member of a club
expected at or planned for at a certain time

of the proper quality or extent;

examination_example.sentence: It's only natural to give praise where praise is <highlight>due</highlight>, right?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该表扬的地方自然要表扬，对吧？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a payment) required at a certain time; charges, for example to be a member of a club

examination_example.sentence: Isn't the chemistry homework <highlight>due</highlight> next Wednesday?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 化学作业不是下周三要交吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 由…导致的；应归功于；应归咎于

examination_example.sentence: How many kilometers of lines are <highlight>due</highlight> to open in the coming months of 2021?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2021年的未来几个月里，将有多少公里的地铁线开放?

examination_example.sentence: Many schools across the country have shut their doors <highlight>due</highlight> to the coronavirus outbreak.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于冠状病毒的爆发，全国许多学校已经关门。

examination_example.sentence: Five balloons blew out <highlight>due</highlight> to pressure（压力）.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于压力，五个气球爆炸了
